column1: Little Goat Diner////We were seated at the worst table in the restaurant- a booth next to the hostess stand at the end of the row. First
column2: there is a clear panel that separates it from the table next to it
column4: but I can get over it. What I can't get over is the fact that EVERY staff member who walked by bashed into or slapped the back of my bench
column5: which was extremely disruptive to my meal. Seriously
column7: ask them to seat you anywhere else- even the counter!
